review: Only used this a few times, but it seems to work well and seems to load up faster than our old Roku did.
author: Ken Stults

review: I love it. As part of my goal to cut cable, the Fire Stick is great. So far with Sling TV as an add on, it's only costing me $20/mo. to get as much if not more TV than I want.  Great products.
author: Larry Resnick

review: This was our second fire stick and we love them!
author: Natalie Carroll

review: Easy to install and works great!I am not tech savy.  This was easy and I can now access Netflix on my TV instead of watching it on my pc.
author: Rita Cavataio

review: love this thing!..download the app for your phone ..plug it into an hdmi port and enjoy an instant very quick and responsive smart tv!
author: adam

review: Not happy have had this for a week it shows network connected then when I go to access apps says I got no connection have restarted it doesn't fix it maybe got a defect one returning it
author: Sumer

review: Amazing. I have had Rokus in the past and still use them, but since we set up a den with no cable I didn't want to give up the plug in on my tv so I bought this. I ended up using it on the master bedroom television and it's my favorite. I typically watch more Prime so it just made sense to have the amazon stick in the bedroom. Really quick load up and super easy to use.
author: rae
